name: lukas_chylik_portfolio
description: NPM confiwg with stylelint. Updated on 4.5.2021
author: Lukáš Chylík

scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:css && npm run bundle:js
scripts.postcss: npm run compile:scss && postcss wwwroot/CSS/style.css --config Resources/postcss.config.js -o wwwroot/CSS/style.css
scripts.bundle:css: npm run stylelint && npm run compile:scss && postcss wwwroot/CSS/style.css --config Resources/postcss.config.js | cleancss -o wwwroot/CSS/style.min.css
scripts.bundle:js: npm run compile:ts && uglifyjs -o wwwroot/JS/app.min.js -c -m -- wwwroot/JS/app.js
scripts.watch:scss: npm run bundle:css & watch "npm run bundle:css" Resources/Stylesheets/SCSS
scripts.watch:ts: npm run compile:ts -- -w && npm run bundle:js
